thread.title: AccuQuilt Welcomes a New Content Marketing Director
thread.title_full: AccuQuilt Welcomes a New Content Marketing Director - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: AccuQuilt Welcomes a New Content Marketing Director
text:
Suzan Ellis brings over 20 years of experience in the quilting industry.
Omaha, NE (PRWEB) October 26, 2015
AccuQuilt welcomes Suzan Ellis, their new content marketing director who brings over 20 years of experience in the quilting industry and a wealth of knowledge to the company.
Ellis has an extensive background in sales, marketing, and ecommerce. She previously worked as the director of sales at the American Quilter’s Society. She also served as president of Quilts & Other Comforts for seven years and was the director of marketing at Quilter’s Newsletter Magazine for over ten years.
Ellis holds a BFA from Wayne State University and has designed over 200 quilting fabrics for major textile manufacturers. Her extensive knowledge of the quilting world will greatly expand content opportunities for AccuQuilt in all areas of the company.
“We are excited to have Suzan join our team, and we’re looking forward to working with her to bring our content to the next level, “ said AccuQuilt President Greg Gaggini.
As AccuQuilt continues to show leadership in the fabric cutting industry, the quilting community can look forward to refreshing new content.
About AccuQuilt—Better Cuts Make Better Quilts
Headquartered in Omaha, Neb., AccuQuilt offers quilters, fabric crafters and retailers a premiere line of fabric cutters, dies, quilting patterns and other quilt and fabric cutting solutions that help quilters quickly and accurately cut shapes for quilting and fabric crafts. AccuQuilt also offers quilters a wide variety of rich educational resources to enhance their quilting experiences. Cutting with AccuQuilt cutters is a natural evolution of fabric cutting methods. "First scissorsthen rotaryfinallyAccuQuilt" for fast, easy, accurate fabric cutting. For more information, visit accuquilt.com or call 888.258.7913.
